alert.note: Alert for Madison; Orange (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 12 at 9:43PM EDT until July 13 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia, northern Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following counties: in central Virginia, Orange. In northern Virginia, Culpeper. In northwest Virginia, Madison. * WHEN...Until 345 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 941 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orange... Madison... Brightwood... Rapidan... Nasons... Locust Dale... Madison Mills... Mitchells... Everona... Unionville... Twymans Mill... Oakpark... Montford... Montpelier Station... Raccoon Ford... Rhoadesville... Verdiersville... Aroda... Old Somerset... Rochelle... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
